thread.title: Varun Dhawan Looks Adorable In The New Teaser Of Badrinath Ki Dulhania
thread.title_full: Varun Dhawan Looks Adorable In The New Teaser Of Badrinath Ki Dulhania

title: Varun Dhawan Looks Adorable In The New Teaser Of Badrinath Ki Dulhania
text:
facebook 
Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan are going to come together on-screen a second time with their upcoming film, Badrinath Ki Dulhania . The movie is a sequel to the 2014 movie, Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania . Set in a different state, the movie will explore another cute love story between this good-looking couple. Alia and Varun are taking every step to promote their upcoming project. The two will also come together on the show, Koffee With Karan, for the same. In fact, they performed together on the new song of their new film, in the show, Umang. The teaser of the film is out and Varun plays an innocent, funny boy in this one. The movie is scheduled to release on March 10. See the teaser below. Photo Credit: YouTube
